definition: the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: In fact, in some regions, DST could actually cause the consumption of more energy.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，在某些地區夏時制可能導致了更高的能耗。
爲什麼實行夏時制的日子被稱爲“綠色日子”？

sentences.english: Permanent Daylight Saving Time? Might Boost Tourism, Efficiency
sentences.chinese: 永久夏時制？也許會推動旅遊業發展，提高效率

sentences.english: Historically, the prospect of energy savings drove widespread embrace of daylight savings.
sentences.chinese: 歷史上，節約能源的前景推動了夏時制的普及。

sentences.english: Daylight Saving Energy Gains Real or Imagined?
sentences.chinese: 夏時制節約能源，亦真亦幻？
